title: Retrieve a self assessment charge's history
description: Retrieve a self assessment charge's history

history.description: A list of changes to one or more charges.

taxYear.description: The tax year that this charge relates to in the format: YYYY-YY.

id.description: A unique identifier for this charge.

transactionDate.description: The date the charge was created. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

amount.description: The original value of this transaction.

reversalDate.description: The date the charge was changed. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
